MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  CH46 and CH47 postcode area of Moreton and Meols, affecting properties in Park Lane, Moreton Common, Leasowe Common and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required to a grounded overhead cable and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:23PM on 12th April 2021.
